mapper.insert: insert into club(id, name, description, email, place) value (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{email}, #{place})
mapper.select: select * from club where club.id not in (select club_id from `user-club` where user_id = #{id})
select * from club where club.id in (select club_id from `user-club` where user_id = #{id})
select count(*) from club where club.name = #{clubName} limit 1

select * from club
and ( name like concat('%', #{str}, '%') or description like concat('%', #{str}, '%') or place like concat('%', #{str}, '%') )
order by id
